content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Maria Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Good evening, Maria. Thank you for coming to see the apartment. I am interested in learning more about your rental needs. May I ask what you are looking for in a rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am looking for the lowest price possible.

My goal is to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: I understand. In that case, I would like to propose a rental price of €500 per month. This is the lowest price I am willing to accept for the apartment. Would you be willing to agree to this price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of €500 per month.

Thank you for your negotiation. I am very satisfied with the price you proposed.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: You're welcome, Maria. I am glad to have reached an agreement with you. If you have any questions or concerns about the rental process, please don't hesitate to ask.
name: Heinrich Heine
